PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-13062019-09-04,  ,  ,  ,  ,  DND,  PS
ActAvoiding Complicity in Mistreatment by Foreign Entities Act
SubjectAvoiding Complicity in Mistreatment by Foreign Entities ** Chief of the Communications Security Establishment **
PrecisOrder authorizing the ISSUANCE of written directions to the Chief of the Communications Security Establishment respecting the disclosure of, and request for information required by the AVOIDING COMPLICITY IN MISTREATMENT BY FOREIGN ENTITIES ACT, in order to demonstrate the Government's commitment to make Canada's information sharing regime more transparent, consistent, and accountable, and enhance oversight on a government-wide basis.
AttachmentsAttachment
